name: 凯拉·赞德尔

last_movies.title: 中情局律师 第一季

introduction: Kaylah is a Latinx-Canadian actor who was born and raised in East Vancouver. Her mother is European-Canadian and her father was a Chilean refugee. She completed a Bachelor of Arts in Anthropology at the University of British Columbia before beginning to audition for film and television in 2017. She has since trained at The Neighborhood Playhouse and The Fitzmaurice Institute in NYC and in Vancouver with her mentor Lori Triolo.Kaylah is known for her portrayal of Melissa O'Neil in Rescued By Ruby opposite Grant Gustin and for her recurring roles on iZombie, The 100 and Chilling Adventures of Sabrina. Favorite projects include the short film Colours by actor/director Brooklyn Prince, her independent work with Vancouver director Gloria Mercer and collaborations with Boldly Creative. Kaylah splits her time between Vancouver and Mexico City.
